### Government Tender Announcement

#### Project Title
2 Service Battalion Administration Company Building

#### Project Overview
This project involves the construction of a new 12,000 square meter facility for the 2 Service Battalion Administration Company at Garrison Petawawa. The building will be multi-use, featuring offices, vehicle maintenance areas, and vehicle storage. Construction will also include exterior improvements, paved parking areas, and utilities.

#### Estimated Value and Timeline
The overall project value is estimated at $70,000,000. The tender is expected to be advertised in the fall/winter of 2023, pending approval from the Department of National Defence (DND).

#### Security Requirements
To be eligible for contract award, contractors must hold all required security clearances at the time of tender closing. Anticipated security clearances include:

* Facility Security Clearance (FSC) at the level of Secret, granted or approved by the Contract Security Program (CSP), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).

#### Industrial Security Program (ISP)
Defence Construction Canada (DCC) provides contractors with early access to the security clearance application process through its ISP. Interested contractors without the required clearances should begin the security clearance application process by submitting a sponsorship request application to DCC. The application process includes:

* Quoting the contractor number (C.004366) and level of clearance requested.
* Providing personal and business information as required.

#### Sponsorship Process
Upon receipt, DCC will review the sponsorship request application and communicate directly with the contractor to complete the sponsorship request package. The sponsor will then forward the package to the CSP, PWGSC for processing. Interested contractors should contact DCC at (613) 998-8974 or ISP.Sponsorship@dcc-cdc.gc.ca for more information.

#### Tender Documents
Tender documents are available on Merx.com. A fee may apply, and pre-qualification is pending approval from DND. Bidders must submit their tender proposals to Merx.com by the specified deadline.

#### Contact Information
For questions regarding the sponsorship process, please contact DCC's Industrial Security Program.

**Commitment and Disclaimer**
By participating in the sponsorship process, contractors acknowledge that the outcome is subject to the terms, conditions, and timelines of DCC's Industrial Security Program and the CSP's security clearance granting process. Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is not responsible for any failure in the sponsorship process or the granting of security clearances.
